document_data.name: Wandering Swordmage
document_data.mainbody: '''Wandering swordmages''' were those practitioners of [[swordmage|sword magic]] who studied enjoyed a wide variety of combat styles and contrasting aspects of the [[arcane magic|arcane arts]].
document_data.Culture: These [[swordmage]]s gleaned insights from all across the Realms, forming their own unique style that was as varied as their scholarly interests. They were scholars of local folklore, history, and philosophy as much as they were practitioners of battle [[magic]]..
document_data.Abilities:
Using their keen intuition, wandering swordmages were able to bolster the effects of their ''[[Aegis of shielding|defensive]]'' and ''[[Aegis of assault|offensive aegis spells]]''.

They were quick learners and rapidly gained insight into the behaviors and patterns of their foes in battle.

Wandering swordmages developed a number of distinct moves, such as the "four corners attack" which slashed at an enemy from different angles.

Using their [[sword]], they could create a pair of ''[[portal]]s'' and ensnare an enemy through them to a location of their choosing.

The most experienced wandering swordmages could conjure a whirling shield of luminous, [[magic]]al blades that defended them and their allies.
